jobDescription: We're the driverless car company. Were building the worlds best autonomous vehicles to safely connect people to the places, things, and experiences they care about.  Our vehicles are on the road in California, Arizona, and Michigan navigating some of the most challenging and unpredictable driving environments. Were hiring people who want to solve todays most complex engineering challenges and make a positive impact.  The Core Data Science team models the relationships between the performance of our fleet and the engineering and capital resources that generate it. We use these models to increase Cruises safety and efficiency, from software development to the curbside. With such a wide space to explore you will be joining a diverse team, including operations researchers; mathematicians; economists; software engineers; and physical, cognitive, and behavioral scientists. You and your colleagues will verify our safe-to-launch readiness, design the algorithms that power an autonomous ridehail service, and establish commit-level performance testing frameworks for simulations and road exposure.Responsibilities
